ygData.subject: Re: Bridge to Erudin?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Stand around qyneos bank you here him  Spout it off in about 15 minutes .. -- Jamie Macdonald A.K.A Magis DarkStone Mercenary Mage Erollisi Marr ... I ve
ygData.messageBody:
Mushin wrote:

> From: "Mushin" <mushin@...>
>
> On the first day that I played EQ I remember talking to an NPC who wanted to
> build a bridge to Erudin.. But for the life of me I can not remember where.
> I have wandered the city of Qeynos for days and still can not find him. Can
> anyone help out with this?
>
> Thanks
>

Stand around qyneos bank you here him Spout it off in about 15 minutes ..




--

Jamie Macdonald

A.K.A
Magis DarkStone
Mercenary Mage
Erollisi Marr

-----------------------------------------------------------

"I've been a Wizard, Magician, Sorcerer, And Charlatan."

"Knowledge Is Power, Learn how to use It"

"Two are 10 times more powerful than One"
